event_data.continuation_prompt:
Mission: StageOrchestrator API Compatibility - Final Validation & Cleanup
=========================================================

PREVIOUS CYCLE SUMMARY:
Cycle 1 completed comprehensive API compatibility audit. All 45 tests passed, confirming 100% backward compatibility between StageOrchestrator and legacy RDMissionController.

OBJECTIVE FOR THIS CYCLE:
Perform final production validation by running an actual mission through the modular engine to confirm end-to-end functionality in real conditions.

TASKS:

1. PRODUCTION VALIDATION
   - Clear any remaining Python cache files (__pycache__, *.pyc)
   - Verify USE_MODULAR_ENGINE=true is active
   - Run atlasforge_conductor.py with a simple test mission
   - Confirm no AttributeError or property setter errors occur

2. EDGE CASE MONITORING
   - Watch for any edge cases not covered by unit tests
   - Check logs for any warnings about missing attributes
   - Verify WebSocket events emit correctly on stage transitions

3. DOCUMENTATION UPDATE (if needed)
   - Update any outdated API documentation
   - Add migration notes if legacy code needs updating

SUCCESS CRITERIA:
- atlasforge_conductor.py runs without modification
- No AttributeError for any method or property
- No 'property has no setter' errors
- Mission transitions through all stages correctly

FILES TO REFERENCE:
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/orchestrator.py (verified implementation)
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/state_manager.py (verified implementation)
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/missions/mission_829fd261/workspace/artifacts/test_results.md (test evidence)

NOTE: This is a validation cycle. No new code should be needed unless issues are discovered during production testing.

cycle_report.summary: Completed comprehensive API compatibility audit and verification of StageOrchestrator against legacy RDMissionController. All 45 tests pass (17 self-tests, 14 adversarial edge cases, 3 integration tests, 11 functional tests). The StageOrchestrator now has 100% backward API compatibility including mission getter/setter, load_mission(), load_mission_from_file(), save_mission(), set_mission(), reset_mission(), update_stage(), build_rd_prompt(), process_response(), mission_dir property, and all utility methods.
achievements: Verified all 19 API methods/properties exist in StageOrchestrator
Confirmed mission property has both getter and setter
Confirmed mission_dir property exists and returns Path
Confirmed load_mission() method returns dict from disk
Confirmed load_mission_from_file() method exists for template loading
Ran 45 comprehensive tests covering self-tests, edge cases, integration, and functional scenarios
All 3 original error cases that triggered the mission are resolved
Achieved 100% epistemic test score with rigorous coverage
issues: No issues found - all API compatibility requirements are satisfied
